title: Wanted: The Superfriends/Rokan: Enemy from Space
description: Lex Luthor creates a Dream Machine that causes the SuperFriends to steal the world's treasures overnight; Bizarro and Cheetah turn people around the world into Bizarros and Cheetahs.

title: Invasion of the Fearians/The Demons of Exxor
description: The Legion of Doom tricks the SuperFriends into making the earth habitable for the Fearians, a race of intelligent three-headed creatures from Venus.

title: The World's Deadliest Game/Battle at the Earth's Core
description: Brainiac tricks Wonder Woman, Hawkman and Black Vulcan onto Toyman's planet of deadly toys, as the Riddler sends the rest of the SuperFriends on a wild goose chase looking for them.

title: The Time Trap/Sinbad and the Space Pirates
description: The Legion of Doom uses Gorilla Grodd's inter-spatial time conveyor to steal history's greatest treasures and to trap six of the SuperFriends in the past.

title: Trial of the SuperFriends/The Pied Piper from Space
description: The Legion of Doom steals the power devices from Wonder Woman, Batman, Robin and Green Lantern and force them to fight android duplicates of themselves, which have the advantage of possessing their own devices.

title: Monolith of Evil/Attack of the Vampire
description: Solomon Grundy takes the Legion of Doom down to center of the Earth where he shows them a monolith that he claims is the source of all evil. The Legion schemes to trick the SuperFriends into obtaining it for them.

title: The Giants of Doom/The Beasts Are Coming
description: Bizarro comes up with a scheme to turn himself, Sinestro, Toyman and Captain Cold into 100-foot giants.

title: Secret Origins of the SuperFriends/Terror from the Phantom Zone
description: Lex Luthor takes the Legion of Doom into the past so that they can prevent Superman, Wonder Woman and Green Lantern from coming into existence.

title: Revenge on Gorilla City/The Anti-Matter Monster
description: The Legion of Doom takes over Gorilla City and, with a mind control device, creates an army of gorillas to conquer Africa.

title: Swamp of the Living Dead/World Beneath the Ice
description: A swamp witch conjures an evil being for the Legion of Doom. The sinister disembodied head gives them an army of zombies in exchange for the SuperFriends.

title: Conquerors of the Future/Invasion of the Brain Creatures
description: The Legion of Doom pretends to be the Legion of Good before traveling to 3984 and taking over a domed city with the help of the primitive Barlocks.

title: The Final Challenge/The Incredible Space Circus
description: The godlike ruler, Vartoo, forces the SuperFriends and the Legion of Doom to compete in deadly games.

title: Fairy Tale of Doom/Batman: Dead or Alive
description: The Legion of Doom uses Toyman's fantastic invention to trap three of the SuperFriends in the worlds of storybooks: "Jack and the Beanstalk", "Alice's Adventures in Wonderland" and "Gulliver's Travels".

title: Doomsday/Battle of the Gods
description: Black Manta, Sinestro and Cheetah take revenge on the Legion of Doom.

title: SuperFriends: Rest in Peace/Journey Through Inner Space
description: The Legion regains possession of the deadly crystal, Noxium, which has the power to kill any SuperFriend instantly - even Superman.

title: The History of Doom/The Rise and Fall of the Super Friends
description: Three aliens arrive on Earth after it has been destroyed and learn the origins of the SuperFriends and the Legion of Doom.
